mapper.insert: insert into plans( id, detail, yearFrom, yearTo, referUserId, createdAt, updatedAt, isDeleted ) values( #{id}, #{detail}, #{yearFrom}, #{yearTo}, #{referUserId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, false )
mapper.update: update plans set detail = #{detail}, yearFrom = #{yearFrom}, yearTo = #{yearTo}, referUserId = #{referUserId}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, where id = #{id}
update plans set updated_at = #{updatedAt}, isDelete = true, where id = #{id}
